value.condition: Container.Content(songs) + !Window.IsVisible(script.globalsearch.xml) + Skin.HasSetting(Hide.Label2.Lists) + Skin.HasSetting(Enable.HourMinutes) + Skin.HasSetting(ShowRatingMain) + Skin.HasSetting(ShowRatingUser) + [Integer.IsGreater(ListItem.PlayCount,0) + Skin.HasSetting(ShowPlayCount)]

Control.IsVisible(53) + Skin.HasSetting(53_FileNameNotTitle) + !ListItem.IsFolder + !String.StartsWith(Container.FolderPath,plugin) + [Container.Content() | Container.Content(files) | Container.Content(movies) | Container.Content(episodes) | Container.Content(videos) | Container.Content(images)]

[[String.IsEqual(ListItem.DBType,movie) | Container.Content(movies)] + Skin.HasSetting(Hide.Label2.Lists) + [Integer.IsGreater(ListItem.PlayCount,0) + Skin.HasSetting(ShowPlayCount)] + Skin.HasSetting(Enable.HourMinutes)] + Skin.HasSetting(ShowRatingMain) + Skin.HasSetting(ShowMPAA)

String.IsEqual(ListItem.DBType,video) + [Container.Content(movies) | Container.Content(tvshows) | Container.Content(episodes)] + Skin.HasSetting(Enable.HourMinutes) + Skin.HasSetting(ShowRatingMain) + Skin.HasSetting(ShowMPAA)

String.IsEqual(ListItem.DBType,episode) + Skin.HasSetting(Hide.Label2.Lists) + [Integer.IsGreater(ListItem.PlayCount,0) + Skin.HasSetting(ShowPlayCount)] + Skin.HasSetting(Enable.HourMinutes) + Skin.HasSetting(ShowRatingMain) + Skin.HasSetting(ShowMPAA)

!Player.HasGame + [[[VideoPlayer.IsFullscreen + [!Skin.HasSetting(Hide.SeekBarWhenPaused) | !Player.Paused]] | [VideoPlayer.IsFullscreen + Player.Paused + Skin.HasSetting(Hide.SeekBarWhenPaused) + !System.IdleTime(5)]] | Window.IsVisible(MusicVisualisation.xml)] + [Window.IsVisible(videoosd) | Window.IsVisible(musicosd) | !String.IsEmpty(Player.SeekNumeric) | !String.IsEmpty(PVR.ChannelNumberInput) | Player.Caching | Player.ShowInfo | Player.Seeking | Player.DisplayAfterSeek | [[Player.Paused + Skin.HasSetting(Hide.SeekBarWhenPaused) + !System.IdleTime(5)] | [Player.Paused + !Skin.HasSetting(Hide.SeekBarWhenPaused)]] | Player.Forwarding | Player.Rewinding | Window.IsActive(DialogFullScreenInfo.xml) | Window.IsVisible(DialogPlayerProcessInfo.xml)]
